name: Soda Gas Blast
description:
You are a happy soda bottle that has to get to the packing machine, but when you move, the bottle shakes and the gas meter goes up. If the gas meter fills, you will explode.

Controls:

  • Move: A & D / Left arrow & Right arrow
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Aim: Left Shift
  • Shoot: Left Shift + Left Mouse Click
  • Pause: Esc
